reasoning: Liposarcoma represents ~20% of soft tissue sarcomas. Global STS incidence ~3-5 per 100k; liposarcoma ~0.25 per 100k (most common adult STS subtype).
source: Toro JR et al. (2006). Incidence patterns of soft tissue sarcomas, regardless of primary site, in the surveillance, epidemiology and end results program, 1978-2001. Int J Cancer. 119(12):2922-30
